kyuz0/amd-r9700-ai-toolboxes

Containers for LLMs on AMD Radeon GPUs

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Container for serving LLMs on AMD Radeon R9700 GPUs
  • Runs LLMs on AMD NPUs
  • system container and virtual machine manager for Linux containers and VMs
  • Armbian build scripts and tools for running on Amlogic S9xxx and similar ARMboxes
  • Resources for running LLMs on local hardware
  • containerized server for fetching web content for LLMs
  • Python toolkit for building LLM and RAG apps with lots of small, specialized models
  • Notebooks for building neural networks and LLM systems from scratch
  • GPU kernels written from scratch
